title: Sugar Daddy Killer
overview: Sasha has just ended a relationship with her boyfriend and is looking for a fresh start. Her friend Tonya tells her she needs to get a Sugar Daddy to forget about her boyfriend, and get her bills paid. Sasha starts dating a Sugar Daddy and decides she is going to scam him. When Sasha's Sugar Daddy wants more than conversation, she is forced to kill him. Now Sasha decides to start killing one Sugar Daddy after the next to get all the money she can.
